SEARCH
Package KI306.Yarmola.Lab2

Class Locomotive

java.lang.Object
KI306.Yarmola.Lab2.Locomotive
public class Locomotive extends Object
The Locomotive class represents a locomotive and its operations. It includes functionality for managing the locomotive's engine, doors, speed, and train cars. This class also logs events to a file named "Log.txt".
Version:
1.0
Author:
Yurii Yarmola

  • Constructor Details

    • Locomotive

      public Locomotive() throws FileNotFoundException
      Default constructor for the locomotive.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - Thrown when "Log.txt" file is not found.

    • Locomotive

      public Locomotive(boolean engine_working, int train_car_number, boolean open_door) throws FileNotFoundException
      Parameterized constructor for the locomotive.
      Parameters:
      engine_working - Specifies if the engine is initially working.
      train_car_number - The initial number of train cars.
      open_door - Specifies if the door is initially open.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - Thrown when "Log.txt" file is not found.
